entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -13.4°C

Visibility: 0.4 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
